nodes.text: Creating Mandalore is a featurette included in the Blu-ray and DVD release of Star Wars: The Clone Wars The Complete Season Two. It covers the development of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' season two episodes "The Mandalore Plot", "Voyage of Temptation" and "Duchess of Mandalore".
The featurette explores the introduction of the Mandalorians and Death Watch in the series, the concept and design of Mandalore, Pre Vizsla, the Darksaber and Satine Kryze.
